appId.name: appId
appId.description: GitHub application id. Optionally use GH_APP_ID environment variable

privateKey.name: privateKey
privateKey.description: GitHub application primate key. Optionally use GH_APP_PRIVATE_KEY environment variable

installationId.name: installationId
installationId.description: GitHub application installationId. Optionally use GH_APP_INSTALLATION_ID environment variable

detailsUrl.name: detailsUrl
detailsUrl.description: Details URL about build. In our case link to Tekton dashboard.
